name: MIA Linux
short_description:
Based on the latest Lubuntu 13.10, 
MIA Linux offers high performance along with comfort.

With MIA you can get more things done faster, and run your system to its maximum potential
together with easy and comfortable access to applications, open windows and workspaces.
It's speed and low consumption makes it the ideal operating system for netbooks, desktops, laptops and whoever wants to get the most out of his PC.

In the video below:
A six years old AMD 4800+, 7200RPM HD, 2GB DDR2 RAM, operates on an HD screen.
Lunching multiple applications for speed demonstration.
It is really impressive that these kind of performance comes from an old HD, and would be expected from an SSD drive.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HTy91GyeumU&feature=youtu.be

MIA is ready to use with new high quality application pack.
You can try it on a live USB/DVD or install it on your computer.

Get it today, it is free!

For guides and donations, visit:
www.grasshopperos.com
